name: TOPCATS x UniSat Title
description:
TOPCATs is 1,314 unique NFTs—featuring tiered rarities, hidden easter eggs, animated pieces, and 1/1 tributes. Designed to bring color and fun to the Bitcoin ecosystem! 

Owning a TOPCATs NFT is more than just art—it’s your membership pass!  Every piece grants access to our community, with benefits & utility tiered by rarity.

Rarity Tiers:
Common - Plain color backgrounds, inscribed on Pizza sats
Rare - Dynamic backgrounds, also on Pizza sats
Epic - Unique 1/1s (including one by Pizza Ninjas artist Boozy) on vintage block 78 sats
Legendary - Animated masterpieces, inscribed on exotic sats

The core utility of TOPCATs? More art.  We have multiple upcoming drops & mints, all designed to reward holders based on rarity. Expect animated collaborations, 3D anamorphic pieces, and an exclusive experimental 333-piece 1/1 collection. WL & perks will be rarity-based. 

But TOPCATs isn’t just about NFTs—it’s about community. Here, people are the utility. Together, we create real value and give each NFT deeper meaning. 

 Our characters pay tribute to some of our favourite Bitcoin & Ordinals collections and entities. A playful yet purposeful nod to what makes this space special

Mint Price: Around 0.0006btc (50u)
